headline: Teledyne FLIR Defense Awarded $42.5 Million Drone Contract for U.S. Marine Corps Organic Precision Fires-Light Program
summary: BOSTON, December 05, 2025--Teledyne FLIR Defense, part of Teledyne Technologies Incorporated (NYSE:TDY), announced that it has been awarded a $42.5 million contract by the U.S. Marine Corps Systems Command for Delivery Order 3 of its Organic Precision Fires-Light (OPF-L) program.
